Method.name: OnProcessInput
Method.Implementation:
#Dim tResponse As GenericMessage
Set pResponseBody=$$$NULLOREF Set tRequest=##class(TP.Message.DiscoveryRequest).%New(pRequestBody,,pRequestBody) Set tSC=..resolveAndIndex(tRequest) Quit:$$$ISERR(tSC) tSC
Set ^aa = tRequest.HTTPHeaders.GetAt("URL")
Quit:..OneWay ..SendRequestAsync(..TargetConfigName,tRequest)
Set tSC=..SendRequestSync(..TargetConfigName,tRequest,.tResponse) Quit:$$$ISERR(tSC) tSC Set pResponseBody=tResponse.Stream Quit tSC
